description: This file defines the ApiService interface for network API calls in the Shopease mobile app. It specifies functions for product retrieval, user authentication, and order management, using Retrofit annotations and suspend functions for coroutine support.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Retrofit service interface defining HTTP API endpoints for products, authentication, and orders.

methods.name: getProducts
methods.description: Fetches a list of products, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: getProductDetail
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific product by ID.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login with provided credentials, returning a User object.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided data, returning a User object.

methods.name: getOrders
methods.description: Fetches a list of orders for the authorized user.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Submits a new order with a list of cart items for the authorized user.
